english name: How Each of Us Spends Our Days Off
japanese name: それぞれの休日の過ごし方
skill name (japanese): 杏とこはねのいない日
skill name (english): A Day Without An and Kohane
skill effect (japanese): 6秒間 GREATがPERFECTになり、5秒間 スコアが30％UPする
skill effect (english): All GREATs and higher will become PERFECTs for 6.0 seconds and 30% score boost for 5 seconds.
